author: William Roberts
title: Trump WHO decision draws criticism from Democrats in US Congress
description: Top Democrat in US Congress labels president's decision to withhold WHO funds 'dangerous and illegal'.
content: Reaction in the US Congress to President Donald Trump's decision to withhold funding for the World Health Organization fell sharply along partisan lines on Wednesday, with Democrats calling it unconscionable and Republicans calling it the right move at the ri… [+3895 chars]
